dct_title_s: Road Network Map of Mongolia / compiled and published by Cartography Co. Ltd. ; editors--Ch. Tsegmed (cartographer), G. Battogtokh (land cadastr).
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by gradient tints and spot heights. Includes distance chart of local auto road network of Mongolia, national flag, national emblem, color illustration, legend, and ancillary map "Direction of International Road."
